title: Why BMW is not keen to invest in India under new EV policy
description: BMW has expressed concerns about India's new EV manufacturing policy, highlighting the lack of recognition for long-standing investors. The policy, aimed at attracting foreign carmakers, offers lower import taxes but treats new and existing companies equally.
